title: Subpart 473-2 - Municipal Gun Buyback Rules(Rule 22, Municipal Gun Buyback Program of the New York State Police)
content:
Subpart 473-2 - Municipal Gun Buyback Rules(Rule 22, Municipal Gun Buyback Program of the New York State Police)

State Regulations
§ 473-2.1 - Purpose and scope. (Rule 22.1)
§ 473-2.2 - Definitions. (Rule 22.2)
§ 473-2.3 - Guidelines for agencies participating in a municipal gun buyback program. (Rule 22.3)
§ 473-2.4 - Participation in a program receiving funding from the Municipal Gun Buyback Fund. (Rule 22.4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
